overload.descr: [1.10/-] Returns the angle whose trigonometric cosine is x, in the range [-PI/2, PI/2] for the domain [-1, 1]
[1.30/-] Returns the angle whose hyperbolic cosine is x, in the range [0, PI] for the domain [-1, 1]
[1.10] Returns true if all elements in the boolean vector v are true, false otherwise
[1.10] Returns true if any element in the boolean vector v is true, false otherwise
[1.10/-] Returns the angle whose trigonometric sine is x, in the range [-PI/2, PI/2] for the domain [-1, 1]
[1.30/-] Returns the angle whose hyperbolic sine is x, in the range [-PI/2, PI/2] for the domain [-1, 1]
[1.10/-] Returns the angle whose trigonometric arctangent is XoverY where XoverY = y/x, in the range [-PI/2, PI/2]
[1.10/-] Returns the angle whose trigonometric tangent is y/x, in the range [-PI/2, PI/2]
[1.10/-] Returns the angle whose hyperbolic tangent is x
[4.30] Performs an atomic addition of data to mem; returns the original mem from before the addition
[4.30] Performs an atomic logical AND of data and mem; returns the original mem from before the addition
[4.30] Performs an atomic comparison of data and comp; if equal, data is written to mem
[4.30] Returns the value of atomic counter c
[4.30] Decrements atomic counter c and returns its new value
[4.30] Increments atomic counter c and returns its new value
[4.30] Atomically exchanges the contents of data and mem; returns original contents of mem
[4.30] Atomically compares contents of mem and data; writes the maximum value to mem and returns its prior value
[4.30] Atomically compares contents of mem and data; writes the minimum value to mem and returns its prior value
[4.30] Performs an atomic logical OR of data and mem; writes the result to mem and returns original mem
[4.30] Performs an atomic logical XOR of data and mem; writes the result to mem and returns original mem
TESSELLATION CONTROL and COMPUTE SHADERS [4.00] Provides a partially defined order of execution between shader invocations
[4.00] Returns the number of set bits in value
[4.00] Extracts bits [offset; offset + bits + 1] from value and returns them in the LSB of the result
[4.00] Copies nbits bits from insert (starting at 0) into base starting at offset
[4.00] Returns the bitwise reverse of value
[1.10/4.00] Returns the nearest integer to x that is greater than or equal to it
[1.10/4.00, int/uint: 1.30] Constrains x to the range [min, max]
[1.10/-] Returns the trigonometric cosine of x in the range [-1, 1]
[1.10/-] Returns the hyperbolic cosine of x
[1.10/4.00] Returns the cross product of vectors a and b
[1.10/-] Converts a quantity in radians to degrees
[1.50/4.00] Returns the determinant of matrix m
FRAGMENT [1.10] Return the partial derivative of an argument with respect to x
FRAGMENT [1.10] Return the partial derivative of an argument with respect to y
[1.10/4.00] Returns the distance between points a and b
[1.10/4.00] Returns the dot product of vectors a and b
GEOMETRY SHADER [4.00] Emits the output variables to the output primitive on stream
GEOMETRY SHADER [1.50] Emits the output variables to the output primitive (on the first stream)
GEOMETRY SHADER [1.50] Completes the current output primitive (on the first stream) and starts a new one
GEOMETRY SHADER [4.00] Completes the current output primitive on stream and starts a new one
[1.10] Returns a boolean vector of component-wise equality comparison results
[1.10/-] Returns the natural exponent of x
[1.10/-] Returns 2 to the power of x
[1.10/4.00] Returns N if dot(R, I) is less than 0, -N otherwise
[4.00] Finds the index of the first set LSB in v; returns -1 if no v is 0
[4.00] Finds the index of the first set MSB in v; returns -1 if no v is 0
[3.30] Returns v's floating-point bit representation as a signed integer
[3.30] Returns v's floating-point bit representation as an unsigned integer
[1.10/4.00] Returns the nearest integer to x that is less than or equal to it
[1.10/4.00] Performs a fused multiply-add operation: a * b + c
[1.10/4.00] Returns the fractional part of x
[4.00/4.00] Returns a floating-point significand in range [0.5; 1) and exponent exp such that: x = significand * 2^exp
VERTEX (deprecated) [1.10 to 1.30] Returns the current vertex transformed by the modelview projection matrix
FRAGMENT [1.10] Return the sum of the absolute derivatives in x and y of v: abs(dFdx(v)) + abs(dFdy(v))

Minnaert BRDF

Performs paraboloid projection on v; fHemisphere is either 1 or -1

[4.30] Waits on the completion of all memory accesses performed by an a compute shader in the same work group
[4.20] Adds the value of data to the contents of the texel at coordinate/index P in image bound to imgunit; returns the original value
[4.20] Adds the value of data to the contents of the texel at coordinate/index P in multisample buffer nsample in image bound to imgunit; returns the original value
[4.20] Stores data AND texel at coordinate/index P in image bound to imgunit; returns the original value
[4.20] Stores data AND texel at coordinate/index P in multisample buffer nsample in image bound to imgunit; returns the original value
[4.20] Stores data at coordinate/index P in image bound to imgunit if texel == compare; returns the original value
[4.20] Stores data at coordinate/index P in multisample buffer nsample in image bound to imgunit if texel == compare; returns the original value
[4.20] Stores data at coordinate/index P in image bound to imgunit; returns the original value
[4.20] Stores data at coordinate/index P in multisample buffer nsample in image bound to imgunit; returns the original value
[4.20] Stores max(data, texel) at coordinate/index P in image bound to imgunit; returns the original value
[4.20] Stores max(data, texel) at coordinate/index P in multisample buffer nsample in image bound to imgunit; returns the original value
[4.20] Stores min(data, texel) at coordinate/index P in image bound to imgunit; returns the original value
[4.20] Stores min(data, texel) at coordinate/index P in multisample buffer nsample in image bound to imgunit; returns the original value
[4.20] Stores data OR texel at coordinate/index P in image bound to imgunit; returns the original value

[4.20] Stores data XOR texel at coordinate/index P in image bound to imgunit; returns the original value
[4.20] Stores data XOR texel at coordinate/index P in multisample buffer nsample in image bound to imgunit; returns the original value

[4.20] Stores sample in img at coordinate P

[4.00] Returns the value at interpolant in multisample buffer msample
[1.40/4.00] Returns the inverse of matrix m
[1.30/4.00] Returns the inverse of the square root of v
[1.10/4.00] Returns component-wise true/false if v is (either positive or negative) infinity

[4.00/4.00] Assembles a floating-point number from value x and exponet exp: x * 2^exp

[1.10/4.00] Computes a modulo b: x - y * floor(x / y)

[1.10] Logically inverts a boolean vector

[1.20/4.00] Returns the outer product of vectors c and r (a multiplied matrix with dimensions RxC)
[4.00] Packs two unsigned integers stored in v into a double-precision number

[1.30/4.00] Rounds x to the closes even integer value
[1.30/4.00, integer: 1.50] Returns 1 if x is greater than 0, 0 if x == 0 and -1 if x is less than 0
